import ~ Rawr.description: Imports entire module statement in ES6 syntax

importNoModuleName ~ Rawr.description: Imports entire module in ES6 syntax without module name

importDestructing ~ Rawr.description: Imports only a portion of the module in ES6 syntax

importEverything ~ Rawr.description: Imports everything as alias from the module in ES6 syntax

importAs ~ Rawr.description: Imports a specific portion of the module by assigning a local alias in ES6 syntax

moduleExports ~ Rawr.description: Module exports from Common JS, node syntax at ES6

exportNamedVariable ~ Rawr.description: Export named variable in ES6 syntax

exportNamedFunction ~ Rawr.description: Export named function in ES6 syntax

exportDefaultFunction ~ Rawr.description: Export default function in ES6 syntax

exportClass ~ Rawr.description: Export default class in ES6 syntax

exportClassExtends ~ Rawr.description: Export default class which extends a base one in ES6 syntax

constructor ~ Rawr.description: Add default constructor in a class in ES6 syntax

method ~ Rawr.description: Creates a method inside a class in ES6 syntax

propertyGet ~ Rawr.description: Creates a getter property inside a class in ES6 syntax

propertyset ~ Rawr.description: Creates a setter property inside a class in ES6 syntax

forEach ~ Rawr.description: Creates a forEach statement in ES6 syntax

forOf ~ Rawr.description: Iterating over property names of iterable objects

forIn ~ Rawr.description: Iterating over property values of iterable objects

anonymousFunction ~ Rawr.description: Creates an anonymous function in ES6 syntax

namedFunction ~ Rawr.description: Creates a named function in ES6 syntax

destructingObject ~ Rawr.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using object destructing

destructingArray ~ Rawr.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using array destructing

setInterval ~ Rawr.description: Executes the given function at specified intervals in ES6 syntax

setTimeOut ~ Rawr.description: Executes the given function after the specified delay in ES6 syntax

promise ~ Rawr.description: Creates and returns a new Promise in the standard ES6 syntax

thenCatch ~ Rawr.description: Add the .then and .catch methods to handle promises

consoleAssert ~ Rawr.description: If the specified expression is false, the message is written to the console along with a stack trace

consoleCount ~ Rawr.description: Writes the the number of times that count() has been invoked at the same line and with the same label

consoleDebug ~ Rawr.description: Displays a message in the console. Also display a blue right arrow icon along with the logged message in Safari

consoleDir ~ Rawr.description: Prints a JavaScript representation of the specified object

consoleError ~ Rawr.description: Displays a message in the console and also includes a stack trace from where the method was called

consoleGroup ~ Rawr.description: Groups and indents all following output by an additional level, until console.groupEnd() is called.

consoleLog ~ Rawr.description: Displays a message in the console

consoleLogObject ~ Rawr.description: Displays an object in the console with its name

consoleTrace ~ Rawr.description: Prints a stack trace from the point where the method was called

consoleWarn ~ Rawr.description: Displays a message in the console but also displays a yellow warning icon along with the logged message

consoleInfo ~ Rawr.description: Displays a message in the console but also displays a blue information icon along with the logged message

consoleTable ~ Rawr.description: Displays tabular data as a table.

consoleTime ~ Rawr.description: Sets starting point for execution time measurement

consoleTimeEnd ~ Rawr.description: Sets end point for execution time measurement
